text: The Hershkovitz's marmoset (Mico intermedia), also known as the Aripuanã marmoset is a marmoset species endemic to Brazil. The common name is a reference to American zoologist Philip Hershkovitz. ==References== ==External links== *Infonatura Hershkovitz's marmoset Category:Mammals of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Hershkovitz's marmoset
title: Hershkovitz's marmoset
